kitsunemod:Charmed.NAME: Charmed
DESCRIPTIONS: This monster will fight for you during this turn.

kitsunemod:DarkPower.NAME: Dark
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, consume this to deal
x your Dark in damage to a random enemy if you're over

kitsunemod:PerfectedShapePower.NAME: Perfected Shape
DESCRIPTIONS: Block at the start of your turn for each turn spent in the same #yShape.

kitsunemod:InTheShadowsPower.NAME: In the Shadows
DESCRIPTIONS: HP instead of being damaged for
more time when taking unblocked damage.
more times when taking unblocked damage.

kitsunemod:InsightPower.NAME: Insight
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play an Aspect card, draw another Aspect card from your deck.

kitsunemod:FastShapePower.NAME: Fast Shape
DESCRIPTIONS: Playing #yShapeshift cards no longer exhausts them.
